mapper.insert: insert into tb_type_template (id, name, spec_ids, brand_ids, custom_attribute_items) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customAttributeItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, name, spec_ids, brand_ids, custom_attribute_items from tb_type_template
